title: Putyatino, Amur Oblast
text:
Putyatino () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">selo</a>) and the administrative center of Putyatinsky Selsoviet of <a href="Mazanovsky%20District">Mazanovsky District</a>, <a href="Amur%20Oblast">Amur Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 265 as of 2018. There are 13 streets.
Geography.
Putyatino is located on the left bank of the Selemdzha River, 16 km northeast of <a href="Novokiyevsky%20Uval">Novokiyevsky Uval</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Taskino is the nearest rural locality.
